Watery Lotion SPF 50 This simple, easy-to-wear SPF is packed with powerful protection with a feel-it-to-believe-it, barely-there finish. Universal and versatile, this everyday sunscreen is formulated for all skin types, tones and routines - it leaves no white cast and has a refreshing, cooling application.. Free of Parabens, Petrochemicals, Phthalate, Sulfate, Mineral Oil, Siloxanes, Formaldehyde, Gluten, Nut, Soy, GMOs, & Nickel. 1.07 fl oz/50ml. Apply generously and evenly 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 40 minutes of swimming or sweating. SOOR-WU113. 816218029241. Supergoop! is the first and only prestige beauty brand 100% dedicated to UV protection. Founded by former teacher and industry pioneer Holly Thaggard and a recipient of numerous industry awards, they are driven by creating innovative, efficacious and ingredient-conscious formulas that deliver broad spectrum protection in unique, feel good ways. A favorite of celebrities and it-girls alike, Supergoop! has you covered, so you can go have your fun in the sun.

products.name: Tower 28 SunnyDays Tinted SPF
products.brandedName: Tower 28 SunnyDays Tinted SPF
products.description: SunnyDays Tinted SPF SunnyDays Tinted SPF SunnyDays is a 2-in-1 mineral sunscreen foundation with SPF 30 that evens redness, protects from sun damage and blue light, and soothes UV-stressed skin while maintaining a natural finish so your real skin (freckles included) can have their moment in the sun. Non-Nano Zinc Oxide protects from UVA/UVB damage and suitable for sensitive skin. Reparative Prickly Pear Extract helps protects from blue light pollution. Anti-inflammatory White Sage Extract helps neutralize free radicals from the sun. Fragrance-free, alcohol-free, non-greasy, non white-cast, and non-oxidizing - for every sunnyday.. In Fairfax - fair with pink undertones. 50% recycled resin packaging, vegan & cruelty-free. Free of Essential Oils, Fragrance, Alcohol, Animal By-Products, Sulfates SLS/SLES, Parabens, Formaldehydes, Formaldehyde-Releasing Agents, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Retinyl Palmitate, Oxybenzone, Coal Tar, Hydroquinone, Triclosan, and Triclocarban. 1 oz/ 30 ml. For light/sheer coverage to even out redness or discoloration: Apply with you fingertips, like moisturizer and blend out. For medium/buildable coverage to cover blemishes and discoloration: Tap on with a dampened beauty sponge, foundation or stippling brush. Tap to layer for higher coverage. TOEI-WU35. T020-01-0000. Tower 28 Beauty is the first beauty brand that's 100% clean, vegan, and free of every known skin irritant. Their products are designed for sensitive skin and made for all. Everything is rigorously dermatologist and allergy tested - plus, it's all made in USA. They're inspired by the effortless California lifestyle, and even borrowed their name from a real lifeguard tower in Santa Monica. A meeting spot for locals, it symbolizes everything they believe in: community, healthy fun, and clean living. Tower 28 Beauty is the magic of that easy breezy day at the beach.

products.aiDescription: Looking for a stylish and comfortable pair of flats? Look no further than the Naturalizer Havana Flat! These black flats are perfect for women who want to look great while staying comfortable. With a rounded block heel and shiny trim, these slip-ons are elevated just enough to make a statement. The pointed toe and V-shaped vamp add a touch of sophistication, while the Contour+ technology ensures a perfect fit. Whether you're heading to the office or out for a night on the town, these flats from Naturalizer are the perfect choice. Get yours now at DSW.

products.name: Cashmere shrunken crewneck sweater
products.brandedName: J.Crew Cashmere shrunken crewneck sweater
products.description: Best in cashmere, since 1983... Meet the new shrunken cashmere crewneck, updated with a more fitted silhouette that feels super-fresh, especially paired with your favorite high-waisted jeans. We're proud to support responsible cashmere production through our partnership with the Aid by Trade Foundation (AbTF), a nonprofit that promotes sustainable agricultural development across the globe. We source cashmere that is certified to the AbTF's The Good Cashmere Standard®, which ensures the welfare of the cashmere goats, protects natural resources and improves the working conditions of farmers and farmworkers in Inner Mongolia.
products.aiDescription: Introducing the J.Crew Cropped Cashmere Crewneck Sweater, the perfect addition to any fashion-savvy woman's wardrobe. Made with finer, loftier fibers, this sweater is incredibly soft and durable. The updated, fitted silhouette pairs perfectly with high-waisted jeans for a chic and trendy look. J.Crew is committed to responsible cashmere production, partnering with the Aid by Trade Foundation to ensure the welfare of cashmere goats and improve working conditions for farmers in Inner Mongolia. Elevate your style and feel great about your investment with this luxurious cashmere sweater.

products.description: Top Knot Choker Top Knot Choker 14k gold filled. Imported. Toggle closure. Measures approx 16 in length. EPIC-WL90. E417. Electric Picks Jewelry is more than just another gold chain. Founded in 2011 by best friends MJ Carlson and Chantel Gia, the brand was born of the idea that jewelry holds our stories and lives our experiences with us. The duo scours the globe for vintage treasures, charms and tokens and recasts them for modern wear. Their cast vintage collection is complimented by a selection of new chains, natural elements and charms -all carefully crafted by New York City metalsmiths. Wherever your story may take you, stay golden.

products.aiDescription: Looking for a show-stopping gown that will make you feel like a mermaid? Look no further than the Metallic Mermaid Gown from Mac Duggal, available at Saks Fifth Avenue. This stunning dress features a low-cut wrapped bust and plunging surplice neckline, with shoulder straps and a concealed back zip for a secure fit. The seamed waist and mermaid hem create a flattering silhouette, while the elegant metallic finish adds a touch of glamour. Perfect for any formal occasion, this gown is sure to turn heads. This is a women's favorite.
